setAdaptiveMeasurement
void setAdaptiveMeasurement(
MipTypes::Command cmd,
const AdaptiveMeasurementData &data
)

Sets the error adaptive measurement settings for the specified command.

Parameter
cmd
MipTypes::Command

the specific error adaptive measurement command to set.

Parameter
data
const AdaptiveMeasurementData&

the adaptive measurement settings to send.

Exceptions

  • Error_NotSupported: The command is not supported by this Node.

  • Error_Communication: There was no response to the command. The command timed out.

  • Error_MipCmdFailed: The command has failed. Check the error code for more details.

  • Error_Connection: A connection error has occurred with the InertialNode.

getAdaptiveMeasurement
AdaptiveMeasurementData getAdaptiveMeasurement(
MipTypes::Command cmd
)

Gets the error adaptive measurement settings for the specified command.

Parameter
cmd
MipTypes::Command

the specific error adaptive measurement command to get.

Return
AdaptiveMeasurementData

The current adaptive measurement settings.

Exceptions

  • Error_NotSupported: The command is not supported by this Node.

  • Error_Communication: There was no response to the command. The command timed out.

  • Error_MipCmdFailed: The command has failed. Check the error code for more details.

  • Error_Connection: A connection error has occurred with the InertialNode.

setDeviceTime
void setDeviceTime(
uint64 nanoseconds
)

Seeds the device time with a specific time.

Exceptions

  • Error_Communication: There was no response to the command. The command timed out.

  • Error_MipCmdFailed: The command has failed. Check the error code for more details.

  • Error_Connection: A connection error has occurred with the DisplacementNode.
